title: Ep. - 397 - PAUL “PK” KEMSLEY FROM REAL HOUSEWIVES OF BEVERLY HILLS NIKKI HASKELL
description:
Paul “PK” Kemsley is the husband of Dorit Kemsley, a cast member on Bravo’s Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. PK discusses his life before TV, how producers found Dorit, behind the scenes of being a cast member on the show, and becoming a fan favorite this season.

 

Author, host and socialite Nikki Haskell talks about being on this season of Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles, and her friendships with Kathy Hilton, the Kardashians, and the late Jackie Collins.

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey
